quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself. – Leo Tolstoy
fact: The name for Oz in the "Wizard of Oz" was thought up when the creator, Frank Baum, looked at his filing cabinet and saw A-N, and O-Z; hence the name "OZ."
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What do you get when you cross a bee and a sheep? A bah-humbug.
